content.description: Dr. Friedrich is interested in whether the personality trait of self-efficacy is relatively stable or changes over the lifetime of humans. Dr. Friedrich gives 500 children a personality survey that measures self-efficacy. Children are given surveys every 5 years, starting when they are 10 years old and finishing when they are 40 years old.
content.question: Which research design is Dr. Friedrich using?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
